City of Duncanville
===================

[City of Duncanville](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/)
City Hall
Government
Duncanville City Council

Duncanville City Council
------------------------

[Duncanville City Council](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/ "Duncanville City Council")

[Mayor](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/mayor/ "Mayor")

[At-Large](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/at_large/ "At-Large")

[District 1](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/district_1/ "District 1")

[District 2](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/district_2/ "District 2")

[District 3](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/district_3/ "District 3")

[District 4](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/district_4/ "District 4")

[District 5](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/district_5/ "District 5")

[Interactive City Council Map](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/city_hall/government/duncanville_city_council/city_council_map/ "Interactive City Council Map")

Last item for navigation

Duncanville City Council
------------------------

![Duncanville City Council group portrait. Seven council members are posed indoors in front of the city logo, with the U.S. and Texas flags visible on either side. Four men stand in the back row wearing suits, and three members, two women and one man, are seated in the front row, also dressed in formal attire.](https://cdnsm5-hosted2.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_61032/Image/City%20Hall/%20Government/Duncanville%20City%20Council/2025%20City%20Council.jpg "Duncanville City Council group portrait. Seven council members are posed indoors in front of the city logo, with the U.S. and Texas flags visible on either side. Four men stand in the back row wearing suits, and three members, two women and one man, are seated in the front row, also dressed in formal attire.")
The Duncanville City Council consists of seven members, including the
[mayor elected at large](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72380)
, one
[council member elected at-larg](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72383)
e, and five council members elected from single-member districts.

City Council Members serve two-year terms, expiring on staggered years. The mayor, district two member, and district four member expire on even-numbered years. Council members and representatives from district one, district three, and district five have terms that expire on odd-numbered years.

The City of Duncanville has a "
Council-Manager
" type of government. The City Council, enacts local legislation, adopts
budgets
, determines policies, appoints the Judge of the
Municipal Court
, and appoints a professional
[City Manager](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=73846)
to carry out day-to-day administrative government operations.

### City Council Meetings

The
[Duncanville City Council](https://maps.app.goo.gl/f7dW7KL4bhRC5izJ7 "Get directions to Duncanville City Hall using Google Maps.")
meets twice per month, on the
[first Tuesday](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/events "Visit the Events Calendar.")
and the
[third Tuesday](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/events "Visit the Events Calendar.")
of every month, at City Hall. A typical Council meeting includes:

City elections are held each May.

### **[Duncanville Mayor](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72380)**

![Mayor Greg Contreras](https://cdnsm5-hosted2.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_61032/Image/City%20Hall/%20Government/Duncanville%20City%20Council/2024%20-%20contreras%20greg.png "Mayor Greg Contreras")

Greg Contreras

(469) 616-8368

**[Councilmember District 1](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72414)**

![Councilmember Joe Veracruz](https://cdnsm5-hosted2.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_61032/Image/City%20Hall/%20Government/Duncanville%20City%20Council/FY23/Mr.%20Veracruz.jpg "Councilmember Joe Veracruz")

(972) 965-7809

[Email](mailto:joe.veracruz@duncanvilletx.gov)

**[Councilmember District 2](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72428)**

### The City of Duncanville Work Plan

On September 20, 2016 the Duncanville City Council formally adopted the FY 2017 Work Plan, which includes the Council's
Mission Statement
and the Six Capstones.

* [City Council Presentations](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/One.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72307# "Click here to navigate folder  'City Council Presentations'")
* The City's Home Rule Charter was adopted by the voters at an election held on May 5, 1962, and is included herein for the benefit of the users of this Code. The original arrangement, including section numbers and catchlines, and article headings, has been retained.

* + - 8:00PM - 9:00PM

* + - 8:00PM - 11:00PM
